TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]National Theatre[COLOR_REVERT] increases the cultural output of the city as well as increasing the city's happiness. It increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]国家剧院[COLOR_REVERT] 增加了城市的文化产出，也增加了城市的幸福感。它增加了这个城市产生大艺术家的机会。

TEXT.English: National Gallery
TEXT.Chinese: 国家美术馆

TEXT.English: Armoury
TEXT.Chinese: 军械库

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]National Gallery[COLOR_REVERT] doubles its city's cultural output and increases its chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]国家美术馆[COLOR_REVERT] 使城市的文化输出翻倍，增加了产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT] 的机会。

TEXT.English: Spaceport
TEXT.Chinese: 太空港

TEXT.English: Trading Company
TEXT.Chinese: 贸易公司

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Secret Service[COLOR_REVERT] increases its city's espionage output and gives experience points to [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Espionage Units[COLOR_REVERT] built in it's city.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]特勤局[COLOR_REVERT] 增加其城市的间谍输出，并为其城市中建立的[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]间谍单位[COLOR_REVERT] 提供经验点。

TEXT.English: Manufactory
TEXT.Chinese: 制造厂

TEXT.English: Central Bank
TEXT.Chinese: 中央银行

TEXT.English: National College
TEXT.Chinese: 国立大学

TEXT.English: Ironworks
TEXT.Chinese: 大铁厂

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]National College[COLOR_REVERT] greatly increases the scientific output of its city. It also allows you to change three citizens into scientists and increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]国立学院[COLOR_REVERT] 极大地提高了城市的科学产出。它还允许你将三个市民转变为科学家，并增加城市生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大科学家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]National Monument[COLOR_REVERT] greatly increases the rate at which its city produces [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great People[COLOR_REVERT], particularly [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artists[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]国家纪念碑[COLOR_REVERT] 大大提高了其城市产生 [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]伟人[COLOR_REVERT] 的速度，特别是[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT] 。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stock Exchange[COLOR_REVERT] increases its city's production of wealth.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]证券交易所[COLOR_REVERT] 增加了城市的财富生产。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Red Cross[COLOR_REVERT] gives all units built in its city the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Medic I[COLOR_REVERT] promotion, and it increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]红十字会[COLOR_REVERT]使所在城市组建的单位获得[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]医疗一级[COLOR_REVERT]晋升，并提升该城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大科学家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Spaceport[COLOR_REVERT] increases spaceship production in all cities and increases its chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]太空港[COLOR_REVERT]增加了所有城市的宇宙飞船产量，并增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。

TEXT.English: National Theatre
TEXT.Chinese: 国家剧院

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]National Park[COLOR_REVERT] greatly increases the health in your city. It also provides a free specialist for each [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Forest Preserve[COLOR_REVERT] in its city radius and increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 建成[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]国家公园[COLOR_REVERT]可消除所在城市因人口规模导致的疾病点数。所在城市范围内的每块[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]森林保护区[COLOR_REVERT]可免费供养一位专业人员，并提升[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大科学家[COLOR_REVERT]的出现几率。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Military Academy[COLOR_REVERT] increases a city's military unit production, grants the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Leadership[COLOR_REVERT] promotion to all units and increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]军事学院[COLOR_REVERT]增加一个城市的军事单位产量，授予所有单位[COLOR_REVERT]领导权[COLOR_REVERT]晋升，并增加城市产生[COLOR_REVERT]大政治家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Trading Company[COLOR_REVERT] generates income for each city that Trading Company has spread to and provides two trade routes. It generates health for its city with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spices[COLOR_REVERT] and happiness for its city with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coffee[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sugar[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tea[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tobacco[COLOR_REVERT]. It increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]贸易公司[COLOR_REVERT]为贸易公司扩展到的每个城市创造收入，并提供两条贸易路线。它为城市带来健康，可以使用[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]香料[COLOR_REVERT]，为城市带来幸福，可以使用[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]咖啡[COLOR_REVERT]，[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]糖[COLOR_REVERT]，[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]茶[COLOR_REVERT]或[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]烟草[COLOR_REVERT]。它增加了城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: Secret Service
TEXT.Chinese: 特勤局

TEXT.English: Military Academy
TEXT.Chinese: 军事学院

TEXT.English: Stock Exchange
TEXT.Chinese: 证券交易所

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Armouries[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's military unit production.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]军械库[COLOR_REVERT] 增加一个城市的军事单位产量。

TEXT.English: Museum
TEXT.Chinese: 博物馆

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Central Bank[COLOR_REVERT] doubles its city's wealth output and increases its chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]中央银行[COLOR_REVERT]使其城市的财富产出翻了一番，并增加了产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商业家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ironworks[COLOR_REVERT] increases a city's production if that city has access to coal and/or iron, but also adds unhealthiness. It increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大铁厂[COLOR_REVERT]可提升城市生产能力（如果城市拥有煤炭或铁），但也会影响健康度。并可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: National Monument
TEXT.Chinese: 国家纪念碑

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Musea[COLOR_REVERT] greatly increase a city's cultural output. They also increase a city's [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great Person[COLOR_REVERT] birth rate depending on the culture level.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]博物馆[COLOR_REVERT] 大大增加了一个城市的文化输出。他们还根据文化水平提高了一个城市的[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]伟人[COLOR_REVERT] 出生率。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Manufactories[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's production and increase trade route yield.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]制造厂[COLOR_REVERT] 增加一个城市的产量和增加贸易路线的产出。
